item.title: Bangalore to Agumbe Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Agumbe can be a thrilling adventure, as you'll get to explore the rainforests, waterfalls, and scenic beauty of the Western Ghats in Karnataka. Agumbe is also known as the "Cherrapunji of South India" due to its high rainfall and lush greenery. Here's a suggested itinerary for your trip: Route Bangalore -> Hassan -> Belur -> Sringeri ->
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
